title: Stuck in login screen
body: After logging out and trying to logging back in i was stuck on "Authenticating....". Is there anyone else experiencing this bug?

replies.body: Hey are you still having this issue?  This can happen if your ISP is having issues, or a local setting is blocking you from getting to the authentication server.  In this case, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help resolve the authentication issue.
I got the same problems, it is just annoying.
has it just recently happened to your client?
no, this is the first time. too bad
sorry that was my NA acc.
